text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Extremadura | official_name = | native_name_lang = | other_name = | settlement_type = Autonomous community | image_alt = Flag of Extremadura | image_caption = | image_flag = Flag of Extremadura with COA.svg | flag_size = | flag_alt = | image_shield = Escudo de Extremadura.svg | shield_size = 70px | shield_alt = Coat-of-arms of Extremadura | nickname = | motto = | anthem = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Extremadura within Spain | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Spain | subdivision_type1 = Largest city | subdivision_name1 = Badajoz | seat_type = Capital | seat = Mérida }} Extremadura is an autonomous community of Spain. Its capital city is Mérida. The provinces Cáceres and Badajoz are a part of Extremadura. Extremadura is bordered by Portugal to the west. To the north, it borders Castile and León. To the south, it borders Andalusia. To the east, it borders Castile-La Mancha.
title: Extremadura
